1: A song for going up to the Temple. Lord, I am in deep trouble, so I am calling to you for help.
2: My Lord, listen to me. Listen to my cry for help.
3: Lord, if you punished people for all their sins, no one would be left alive.
4: But you forgive people, so they fear and respect you.
5: I am waiting for the Lord to help me. My soul waits for him. I trust what he says.
6: I am waiting for my Lord, like a guard waiting and waiting for the morning to come.
7: Israel, trust in the Lord. The Lord is the one who is faithful and true. He saves us again and again,
8: and he is the one who will save Israel from all their sins.
